Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Hamilton.
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Damen & Marquette, due to street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Damen & Marquette, due to street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Additional Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Damen, Marquette, California, 71st, Western to 69th and into the terminal.

Additional Eastbound buses will operate via Western, Marquette, Damen, Western, then resume their normal route on 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer a Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer a Rosemont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
